education.description: I held an intern position within the companies' finance department.
I completed Matric with a Bachelor's Pass.
Studied mechanical engineering and completed N2. I recieved certifications for first aid and safety officer.
Worked as an apprentice in the engineering industry.
Worked as a junior motor technician.
Learnt how to build full-stack applications.
AWS cloud computing certifications and CISCO security certifications, while working on client's applications.

softskills.title: Communication Skills
softskills.description: Clear and effective communication with team members for conveying ideas, discussing requirements, and addressing issues.

softskills.title: Problem-Solving Abilities
softskills.description: The ability to analyze complex problems, break them down into manageable parts, and devise efficient solutions.

softskills.title: Adaptability
softskills.description: Being adaptable to changes and willing to learn new skills.

softskills.title: Time Management
softskills.description: Managing time effectively, setting realistic deadlines, and prioritizing tasks.

softskills.title: Leadership Skills
softskills.description: Even if not in a formal leadership role, the ability to inspire and motivate team members, take initiative, and provide direction can contribute to project success.

projects.info: Built the API for this ecommerce website using Node JS.
Fully functional ecommerce website that I built using HTML,CSS and JavaScript.
Built the design of the original Netflix log in and sign up page.
This is a functional body mass index calculator that I made using JavaScript.
This application converts minutes to seconds, I built it with basic JavaScript.
I used basic html and css to build an ecommerce site.

testimonials.name: Daanyaal
testimonials.quote: I have had the pleasure of working closely with Zubair Moerat for several months, and I can confidently say that they are a standout professional in the software development field.

testimonials.name: Niyaaz
testimonials.quote: As a colleague of Zubair Moerat, I've witnessed firsthand their exceptional talent and commitment to excellence in software development. Their strong communication skills and collaborative nature make them a valuable asset to any development team.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.quote: Working alongside Zubair Moerat has been a rewarding experience, as they bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table in the software development realm.

testimonials.name: Jodi
testimonials.quote: I've had the privilege of supervising Zubair Moerat in their role within our software development team, and I can attest to their outstanding work ethic and technical proficiency.

testimonials.name: Chad
testimonials.quote: Having collaborated with Zubair Moerat on numerous software development projects, I can vouch for their exceptional skills and professionalism.
